about.text: Interested in a maximum dirt after-work-ride, a no-pain-no-gain enduro tour or a relaxed day trip in the tri-state area of Austria, Italy and Slovenia with an officially-certified mountain bike guide? We offer individual tours for beginners and the more advanced near Villach / Faaker See. Reach out to us and join us discovering Kärnten (Carinthia) and the broader Faaker See area.
about.img: Mountainbiker on the top of Schwarzkogel.

certification.text: Officially-certified and licensed mountain bike instructors

about2.title: Experience Faaker See
about2.text: For us, mountain biking is more than just exercise, it is an attitude to life! This unique lifestyle combines endurance, focus, friendship, emotions, culture, and even regional cuisine with the urge to explore nature and to enjoy a breathtaking countryside. Sounds interesting? Join us and discover a lifestyle of flow and heartbeat in the astonishing region of Faaker See!
about2.img: Mountainbiker sitting on a wonderful alp.

einstein.text: "Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving."
einstein.author: Albert Einstein

events.title: Events
events.empty: We're sorry, there are currently no upcoming events.
events.youthDiscountInfo: (*) Young people unter the age of 18.
events.erlebnisCardInfo: (**) Only free with Erlebnis Card. Tickets without Erlebnis Card are only available at our tourist offices and cost 15 EUR. For more information about the Erlebnis Card visit: https://www.region-villach.at/en/offers/region-villach-card-2505115.html
events.furtherInfo: For more information or individual tours please send us your inquiry.

Discover a lifestyle of flow and heartbeat in the astonishing region of Faaker See!"
